Pa'agrio Lord Kakai:
Hear me! I am Pa'agrio Lord Kakai, invested with the authority of Pa'agrio, the father of eternal flame, to lead the great Orc race. Young warrior, you are to my eyes like a flame of hope, hope that our race may yet achieve its former glory. What do you wish from me?
